# .NET MAUI Day

> .NET MAUI Day is an in-person, one-day conference dedicated to cross-platform development with .NET MAUI. Global experts deliver sessions, live discussions, and networking on the cutting-edge .NET MAUI ecosystem.

## About

.NET MAUI Day brings together developers and experts for focused, single-day events in cities across Europe. Previously known as XamExpertDay, the conference has been running since 2019 covering Xamarin and .NET MAUI topics.

## Upcoming Events

- [.NET MAUI Day Kraków 2026](https://mauiday.net/): May 29, 2026 in Kraków, Poland

## Past Events

- [London 2026](https://mauiday.net/archive/london-2026): February 6, 2026
- [London 2025](https://mauiday.net/archive/london-2025): March 14, 2025
- [Cologne October 2024](https://mauiday.net/archive/cologne-2024): October 11, 2024
- [Cologne February 2024](https://mauiday.net/archive/cologne-feb-2024): February 9, 2024
- [XamExpertDay 2023 Cologne](https://mauiday.net/archive/cologne-2023): February 6, 2023
- [XamExpertDay 2021 Online](https://mauiday.net/archive/online-2021): June 11, 2021
- [XamExpertDay 2020 Online](https://mauiday.net/archive/online-2020): October 8, 2020
- [XamExpertDay 2019 Cologne](https://mauiday.net/archive/cologne-2019): October 4, 2019
